name: kf (@kf@666.glitchwit.ch)
summary:
thinking today about back when I was in code school in SF

one of the cofounders was OBSESSED with my two-character twitter handle, and even though I went by my birth name at the time, he would call me kf

so I called him by his handle, too

a year later, one of the staff told me that every time I did this, he would go upstairs in the office, slam doors, and tell the staff that I was insulting him for having a four-character handle ðŸ˜‚

anyway thatâ€™s how I got my name ðŸ¤£

#fragilemasculinity
